Special Permission Required
No

Description:

This course is offered only at Carnegie Mellon's campus in Qatar. The aim of this course is to develop the students' linguistic abilities in Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) for professional purposes through reading articles and documents, writing summaries, reports, memos and e-mails, and giving oral presentations of projects.

Prerequisites
None

None
